titles.title: Alternative Fuel Infrastructure Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the alternative fuel vehicle refueling property credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
4/25/2007--Introduced.
Alternative Fuel Infrastructure Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the rate and dollar limitation for the alternative fuel vehicle refueling property tax credit and to extend such credit through December 31, 2014.
